content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":4801,"originalJapaneseLine":"拷問器具の母としてポピンズ史に残る日立姫の、","translatedEnglishLine":"Princess Hitachi, remembered in Poppins history as the mother of torture devices,"},{"lineNumber":4802,"originalJapaneseLine":"その業績の立役者は、大概の場合に実験台となった、","translatedEnglishLine":"The key figure behind that achievement is said to usually have been the test subject,"},{"lineNumber":4803,"originalJapaneseLine":"実の父親だと伝えられている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Her own biological father."},{"lineNumber":4804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「インスパイア・ザ・ネクストでち！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Inspire the next one!\""},{"lineNumber":4805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむふむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":4806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……参考になりますかねぇ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is this helpful, I wonder?\""},{"lineNumber":4807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大変なりましたでち。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am very grateful."},{"lineNumber":4808,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ありがとうでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thank you.\""},{"lineNumber":4809,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレルギー超大国の姫、日立が","translatedEnglishLine":"Princess Hitachi of the superpower allergy nation"},{"lineNumber":4810,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城を竹うまマシンで闊歩していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was striding boldly through Rance Castle on a hobby horse machine."},{"lineNumber":4811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……何してんだ、ちっこいの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What are you doing, little one?\""},{"lineNumber":4812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむ。人類王」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. Human king.\""},{"lineNumber":4813,"originalJapaneseLine":"日立はランスを頭から足先まで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hitachi looked Rance up and down from head to toe,"},{"lineNumber":4814,"originalJapaneseLine":"じろじろと眺める。","translatedEnglishLine":"staring intently."},{"lineNumber":4815,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー……おかしいでち……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... something's strange...\""},{"lineNumber":4816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":4817,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いい男とは何か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is a good man?"},{"lineNumber":4818,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただし容姿は含めないものとする」","translatedEnglishLine":"Although appearance is not included.\""},{"lineNumber":4819,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは俺様のことだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That means it's me!\""},{"lineNumber":4820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……という質問を、色々な女性にしているのでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...This is a question I have been asking various women.\""},{"lineNumber":4821,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":4822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだか、難しそうな話ですねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Somehow, that sounds like a difficult topic...\""},{"lineNumber":4823,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこなシィル様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You there, Sir Syl."},{"lineNumber":4824,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いかがでちか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you think?\""},{"lineNumber":4825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わたしですか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-me?\""},{"lineNumber":4826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうでち。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes."},{"lineNumber":4827,"originalJapaneseLine":"　男は顔だけが重要というタイプでちか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you the type who thinks only a man's face matters?\""},{"lineNumber":4828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、えぇっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, um...\""},{"lineNumber":4829,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そ、そういうわけでは、ありませんけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not really like that, but...\""},{"lineNumber":4830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだ。何で俺を見る」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What? Why are you looking at me?\""},{"lineNumber":4831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええと、いえその……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, um, it's just...\""},{"lineNumber":4832,"originalJapaneseLine":"「構いまちぇん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't worry about it."},{"lineNumber":4833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類王が怒りだしても、わたちが止めるでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if the Human King gets angry, I'll stop him.\""},{"lineNumber":4834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと貴様！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say, you bastard!"},{"lineNumber":4835,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いい男と言えば俺の事だろうが！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you say 'good man,' you mean me!\""},{"lineNumber":4836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は〜あぁ……ヤレヤレでち。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha~ah... Good grief."},{"lineNumber":4837,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなポピンズを丸呑みにしそうな口のサイズで、","translatedEnglishLine":"With a mouth big enough to swallow Poppins whole,"},{"lineNumber":4838,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よくもまあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"how can you be so calm?\""},{"lineNumber":4839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、容姿は問わないっつったろーが！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I said appearance doesn't matter!\""},{"lineNumber":4840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういう聖人君子やマゾヒスト的な意味では","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm not talking about such saintly or masochistic meanings,"},{"lineNumber":4841,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ないのでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"you know.\""},{"lineNumber":4842,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You...\""},{"lineNumber":4843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあシィル様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, Sir Syl."},{"lineNumber":4844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご意見伺わせて欲しいでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"I would like to hear your opinion.\""},{"lineNumber":4845,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええと……そう、ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... well."},{"lineNumber":4846,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱり、優しいところとか……","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess kindness,"},{"lineNumber":4847,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頼りがいがあるとか……そういう事では……」","translatedEnglishLine":"or being dependable... things like that...\""},{"lineNumber":4848,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむふむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, hmm..."},{"lineNumber":4849,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類王、強く生きていって欲しいでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"Human King, I want you to live strongly.\""},{"lineNumber":4850,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……叩き潰すぞ、このちみっ子……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Grr... I'll crush you, little brat..."},{"lineNumber":4851,"originalJapaneseLine":"　完全に今のは俺の事だろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was totally about me just now.\""},{"lineNumber":4852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………全然違う」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........ Not at all.\""},{"lineNumber":4853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだとーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whatーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":4854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えと、あの！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, uh, excuse me!"},{"lineNumber":4855,"originalJapaneseLine":"　日立姫様、この質問は、どういう……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Princess Hitachi, what kind of... is this question!\""},{"lineNumber":4856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……東芝様を更正させるにあたり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...When reforming Lord Toshiba,"},{"lineNumber":4857,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まずはゴール地点を定めているのでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"we are first setting the goal point.\""},{"lineNumber":4858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はあ……あの東芝王子を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hah... that Prince Toshiba...\""},{"lineNumber":4859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゴール。つまりいい男。","translatedEnglishLine":"The goal. In other words, a good man."},{"lineNumber":4860,"originalJapaneseLine":"　容姿は問題ありまちぇんから、それ以外","translatedEnglishLine":"Appearance doesn't matter, so aside from that...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拷問器具の母としてポピンズ史に残る日立姫の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Hitachi, remembered in Poppins history as the mother of torture devices,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その業績の立役者は、大概の場合に実験台となった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The key figure behind that achievement is said to usually have been the test subject,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実の父親だと伝えられている。
「インスパイア・ザ・ネクストでち！」
アレルギー超大国の姫、日立が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Hitachi of the superpower allergy nation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城を竹うまマシンで闊歩していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was striding boldly through Rance Castle on a hobby horse machine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日立はランスを頭から足先まで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hitachi looked Rance up and down from head to toe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし容姿は含めないものとする」
「……という質問を、色々な女性にしているのでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...This is a question I have been asking various women."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだか、難しそうな話ですねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow, that sounds like a difficult topic..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男は顔だけが重要というタイプでちか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you the type who thinks only a man's face matters?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そういうわけでは、ありませんけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not really like that, but..."
"...What? Why are you looking at me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類王が怒りだしても、わたちが止めるでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if the Human King gets angry, I'll stop him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい男と言えば俺の事だろうが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say 'good man,' you mean me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなポピンズを丸呑みにしそうな口のサイズで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a mouth big enough to swallow Poppins whole,
how can you be so calm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、容姿は問わないっつったろーが！」
「そういう聖人君子やマゾヒスト的な意味では
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not talking about such saintly or masochistic meanings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご意見伺わせて欲しいでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I would like to hear your opinion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり、優しいところとか……
頼りがいがあるとか……そういう事では……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or being dependable... things like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類王、強く生きていって欲しいでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human King, I want you to live strongly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ……叩き潰すぞ、このちみっ子……
完全に今のは俺の事だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was totally about me just now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日立姫様、この質問は、どういう……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Hitachi, what kind of... is this question!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……東芝様を更正させるにあたり、
まずはゴール地点を定めているのでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we are first setting the goal point."
The goal. In other words, a good man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 容姿は問題ありまちぇんから、それ以外
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Appearance doesn't matter, so aside from that..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その業績の立役者は、大概の場合に実験台となった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The key figure behind that achievement is said to usually have been the test subject,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実の父親だと伝えられている。
「インスパイア・ザ・ネクストでち！」
アレルギー超大国の姫、日立が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Hitachi of the superpower allergy nation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城を竹うまマシンで闊歩していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was striding boldly through Rance Castle on a hobby horse machine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日立はランスを頭から足先まで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hitachi looked Rance up and down from head to toe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし容姿は含めないものとする」
「……という質問を、色々な女性にしているのでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...This is a question I have been asking various women."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだか、難しそうな話ですねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow, that sounds like a difficult topic..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男は顔だけが重要というタイプでちか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you the type who thinks only a man's face matters?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そういうわけでは、ありませんけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not really like that, but..."
"...What? Why are you looking at me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類王が怒りだしても、わたちが止めるでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if the Human King gets angry, I'll stop him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい男と言えば俺の事だろうが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say 'good man,' you mean me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなポピンズを丸呑みにしそうな口のサイズで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a mouth big enough to swallow Poppins whole,
how can you be so calm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、容姿は問わないっつったろーが！」
「そういう聖人君子やマゾヒスト的な意味では
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not talking about such saintly or masochistic meanings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご意見伺わせて欲しいでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I would like to hear your opinion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり、優しいところとか……
頼りがいがあるとか……そういう事では……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or being dependable... things like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類王、強く生きていって欲しいでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human King, I want you to live strongly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ……叩き潰すぞ、このちみっ子……
完全に今のは俺の事だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was totally about me just now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日立姫様、この質問は、どういう……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Hitachi, what kind of... is this question!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……東芝様を更正させるにあたり、
まずはゴール地点を定めているのでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we are first setting the goal point."
The goal. In other words, a good man.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Appearance doesn't matter, so aside from that..."
